definitions.definition: A set of rules that govern how words are combined to form phrases and sentences .
The formal rules of formulating the statements of a computer language.
The study of the structure of phrases, sentences, and language.

main_definition: A set of rules that govern how words are combined to form phrases and sentences .
secondary_definitions: ( computing , countable ) The formal rules of formulating the statements of a computer language.
( linguistics ) The study of the structure of phrases, sentences, and language.
